newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Nestle details 1996 sales by markets.
newsitem.headline: Nestle details 1996 sales by markets.

text.p: Nestle SA gave this breakdown of 1996 sales in principal markets:
millions of Swiss francs in local currency

NOTE: Nestle's 1996 sales rose 7.1 percent to 60.49 billion Swiss francs. Internal sales volume growth of 2.7 percent. Volume growth was satisfactory in every region except North America, where temporary problems in the U.S. beverage division had an impact, it said. "These problems are largely resolved," it said in its annual report.

External growth from acquisitions net of disinvestments was 0.6 percent. The net monetary effect, which primarily reflects increased selling prices and exchange rate variations, was 3.8 percent. After several years of unfavourable impact, exchange rates had a positive impact on sales growth of 1.4 percent.
